properties.description: Pre DIM claim detail from Paris

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> tcrossreference
tcrossreference filter(source_system=='PARIS' && code_type_id==775) ~> parisClaimDetail
xrefcld aggregate(groupBy(cld_description),
	cld_key = first(cld_key)) ~> deduplicator
parisClaimDetail select(mapColumn(
		cld_key = target_code,
		cld_description = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefcld
lastupdatedby alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alterRow
deduplicator derive(last_updated_by = 'pre_dim_claim_detail') ~> lastupdatedby
alterRow sink(partitionFileNames:['pre_dim_claim_detail_pa.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimClaimPA
